hopobject.body:
Angstrom Distribution

The Angstrom Distribution releases demo images for the BeagleBoard, BeagleBoard-xM and BeagleBone that ship with the with the board and are used in the process of validating the boards and diagnostics for users. Of course, they have many uses beyond validation and diagnostics, but there are many other distributions of Linux and other non-Linux software systems you might want to run.

Because this validation and diagnostic function is so important, we've chosen to mirror the Angstrom Distribution demo images:

  • BeagleBoard and BeagleBoard-xM demo images: BeagleBoard.org and Amazon S3
  • BeagleBone demo images
